TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticFirst.name: Prismatic Prelude
TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticFirst.shortDescription: The first augment offered this game will be prismatic tier.

TFT_Portals_Augments_TripleGold.name: Golden Gala
TFT_Portals_Augments_TripleGold.shortDescription: All augments offered this game will be gold tier.

TFT_Portals_Augments_TriplePrismatic.name: Prismatic Party
TFT_Portals_Augments_TriplePrismatic.shortDescription: All augments offered this game will be prismatic tier.

TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticThird.name: Prismatic Finale
TFT_Portals_Augments_PrismaticThird.shortDescription: The last augment offered this game will be prismatic tier.

TFT_Portals_Unique_ScuttlePuddle.name: Scuttle Puddle
TFT_Portals_Unique_ScuttlePuddle.shortDescription: Rift Herald angrily fills the game with crabs carrying bonus loot. On Stage 5+ they are DEADLY.

TFT_Portals_Unique_WanderingTrainers.name: Trainer Golems
TFT_Portals_Unique_WanderingTrainers.shortDescription: Start with a Golem with 3 permanently attached emblems.

TFT_Portals_Unique_CrabRave.name: Crab Rave
TFT_Portals_Unique_CrabRave.shortDescription: Monsters are replaced by crabs that drop bonus loot! Giant crabs are VERY DANGEROUS.

TFT_Portals_Default_NoPortal.name: No encounter.
TFT_Portals_Default_NoPortal.shortDescription: There is no encounter this game.

TFT_Portals_Gold_GoldSubscription.name: Gold Subscription
TFT_Portals_Gold_GoldSubscription.shortDescription: Every stage, gain a random amount of gold. All players gain the same amount.

TFT_Portals_Unique_AugmentRoundSwap.name: Augment Round Swap
TFT_Portals_Unique_AugmentRoundSwap.shortDescription: Augments are given earlier this game.

TFT_Portals_Unique_EarlySnax.name: Earlier Snax
TFT_Portals_Unique_EarlySnax.shortDescription: The second Power Snax is given at 2-6 instead of 3-6.

TFT_Portals_Unique_BeachEpisode.name: Beach Episode
TFT_Portals_Unique_BeachEpisode.shortDescription: Beach Episode! Gain a beach ball that Tacticians can toss around!

TFT_Portals_Unique_WinnersCircle.name: Winner's Circle
TFT_Portals_Unique_WinnersCircle.shortDescription: After Top 4, remaining players gain 10 gold and two Component Anvils.

TFT_Portals_Unique_RegalRumble.name: Regal Rumble
TFT_Portals_Unique_RegalRumble.shortDescription: Carousels have more competitors on them!

TFT_Portals_Unique_ChampionshipRound.name: The Grand Finals
TFT_Portals_Unique_ChampionshipRound.shortDescription: It's the Grand Finals! You're on your own, champion.

TFT_Portals_Items_ArtifactAnvil.name: Artifact Anvil
TFT_Portals_Items_ArtifactAnvil.shortDescription: Start with 1 Artifact anvil (choose a powerful item).

TFT_Portals_Unique_LastTwoStanding.name: Silver Scrapes
TFT_Portals_Unique_LastTwoStanding.shortDescription: The last two surviving players gain 70 gold for an epic final fight.

TFT_Portals_Unique_GoldOnPlayerDeath.name: Reckoner Arena
TFT_Portals_Unique_GoldOnPlayerDeath.shortDescription: Whenever a player is eliminated, surviving players gain 3 gold per eliminated player.

TFT_Portals_Unique_FreeRerolls.name: Cosmic Journey
TFT_Portals_Unique_FreeRerolls.shortDescription: Gain free rerolls at the start of every stage.

TFT_Portals_Unique_GwensGifts.name: Gwen's Gifts
TFT_Portals_Unique_GwensGifts.shortDescription: After the first 3 carousels, Gwen gifts players 1 component and a pair of scissors that cuts items into components.

TFT_Portals_Augments_GoldFirst.name: Golden Prelude
TFT_Portals_Augments_GoldFirst.shortDescription: The first augment offered this game will be gold tier.

TFT_Portals_Items_RadiantItem.name: Radiant Item
TFT_Portals_Items_RadiantItem.shortDescription: Choose 1 of 5 Radiant items later in the game (very powerful versions of completed items).

TFT_Portals_Chosen_Farsight.name: <ShowIfCustom.Set=TFTSet10>Farsight</ShowIfCustom.Set=TFTSet10>
TFT_Portals_Chosen_Farsight.shortDescription: <ShowIfCustom.Set=TFTSet10>Headliner champions appear in your shop as if you were one level higher.</ShowIfCustom.Set=TFTSet10><ShowIfNotCustom.Set=TFTSet10>Chosen champions appear in your shop as if you were one level higher. </ShowIfNotCustom.Set=TFTSet10>

TFT_Portals_Chosen_Omnipotence.name: Omnipotence
TFT_Portals_Chosen_Omnipotence.shortDescription: <ShowIfCustom.Set=TFTSet10>Headliner champions grant plus-one to another one of their traits.</ShowIfCustom.Set=TFTSet10><ShowIfNotCustom.Set=TFTSet10>Chosen champions grant plus-one to another one of their traits.</ShowIfNotCustom.Set=TFTSet10>

TFT_Portals_Unique_LuckyLanterns.name: Lucky Lanterns
TFT_Portals_Unique_LuckyLanterns.shortDescription: Lucky Lanterns containing loot will appear in stage 2 to 4 after carousel.

TFT_Portals_Unique_GrowingProsperity.name: Growing Prosperity
TFT_Portals_Unique_GrowingProsperity.shortDescription: Gain an increasingly powerful anvil at the start of each stage

TFT_Portals_Unique_Fireworks.name: Fireworks
TFT_Portals_Unique_Fireworks.shortDescription: On 2-7 and 3-7, collect fireworks packages.  On 4-7, have a fireworks celebration!

TFT_Portals_Unique_YearOfTheHorse.name: Year of the Horse
TFT_Portals_Unique_YearOfTheHorse.shortDescription: Gain a lucky horse on your bench that runs 1 slot per win and 2 per loss. Get rewards when it reaches the end!

TFT_Portals_Unique_CarouselOfVitality.name: Carousel of Vitality
TFT_Portals_Unique_CarouselOfVitality.shortDescription: Stage 2 and 3 carousels are extra speedy but have extra special loot too!

TFT_Portals_Gold_GoldPerItem.name: Item Payout
TFT_Portals_Gold_GoldPerItem.shortDescription: When you build items, gain gold.

TFT_Portals_Choncc_TrainingArc.name: Choncc's Training Arc
TFT_Portals_Choncc_TrainingArc.shortDescription: Choncc will grant a Power Snax during every visit!
